title: Cork

heroMetric.label: Avg Resolution Time

description: AI-powered security intelligence with automated threat detection and response
executiveSummary: Cork Enhanced delivers advanced AI-powered security intelligence with exceptional threat detection and automated response capabilities. Our AI algorithms analyzed 2,847 security events this quarter, achieving 94% accuracy in threat identification with only 6% false positives. The system automatically contained 89% of detected threats within 15 minutes, significantly reducing manual intervention and improving overall security posture. Your organization now benefits from predictive threat modeling and automated compliance monitoring.

risks.title: Email Configuration Vulnerabilities
risks.description: 6 insecure email configuration events detected, creating potential for email spoofing and phishing attacks.
risks.impact: Email deliverability issues and increased risk of business email compromise attacks.

risks.title: Multi-Factor Authentication Gaps
risks.description: 4 MFA-related security events identified, indicating incomplete implementation across all systems.
risks.impact: Weakened account security and increased risk of credential-based attacks.

risks.title: Outstanding Security Events
risks.description: 6 unresolved security events requiring immediate attention and remediation.
risks.impact: Ongoing security risk exposure and potential compliance violations.

insights.title: Device Protection Coverage
insights.description: 100% device protection coverage demonstrates strong endpoint security controls across all managed devices.

insights.title: Security Integration Stack
insights.description: Comprehensive security stack with 19 active integrations providing multi-layered protection.

insights.title: Event Monitoring Activity
insights.description: Active security monitoring with 17 events detected and 11 resolved, showing responsive security operations.

insights.title: Multi-Domain Management
insights.description: Multi-domain security management with 5 domains under centralized protection and monitoring.

recommendations.title: Address Email Configuration Issues
recommendations.description: Resolve 6 insecure email configuration events to improve email deliverability and prevent spoofing attacks.
recommendations.impact: Improve email deliverability and prevent spoofing attacks

recommendations.title: Enhance Multi-Factor Authentication

recommendations.impact: Strengthen account security and prevent credential-based attacks

recommendations.title: Improve Event Resolution
